Package com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.kanjilist

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KanjiFragment.Callbacks
    Required callback interface to delegate functionality back to the hosting activity.
    KanjiListFragment.Callbacks
    Required callback interface to delegate functionality back to the hosting activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Kanji
    Represents the kanji info for each kanji in the kanjilist for the KanjiListFragment and / or KanjiFragment class(es).
    KanjiFragment
    KanjiFragment which appears when clicking on the RecyclerView kanji list to show the kanji info according to the clicked kanjiId.
    KanjiListActivity
    This is the parent activity of for the KanjiListFragment and / or KanjiFragment class(es).
    KanjiListFilter
    A android.widget.Filter class to constrain data with a filtering pattern.
    KanjiListFragment
    Fragment that shows shows a RecyclerView for each kanji in the database.
    KanjiListManager
    Singleton manager class for the kanjilist package.
    KanjiViewPagerActivity
    This class is a ViewPager for the kanji list from the RecyclerView, using the FragmentStatePagerAdapter, rather the PagerAdapter, so as to simply override the two methods: getCount() and getItem(int).
    KanjiZoomDialog
    This class shows the kanji from KanjiFragment class when the users taps on the kanji TextView.
